text: Rugulina fragilis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Pendromidae. ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 1.4 mm and 4 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off Greenland, Iceland, the Faroes and Norway ==References== ==External links== * Category:Pendromidae Category:Gastropods described in 1878
title: Rugulina fragilis
